Throughout the year, observe children &: Ekuhambeni konyaka wonke, qapha izingane bese ubhala lokho okuqaphele.
Let's pretend you're tracking progress f: Ake sishaye sengathi ulandelela inqubekela phambili yengane enegama elinguThemba. Thinta lapha ukuze uqale!
You will be shown the right assessment f: Uzokhonjiswa isivivinyo esifanele seminyaka yobudala yengane.
Pretend that, while observing Temba, you: Ake ushaye sengathi, ngenkathi uqaphe inqubekela phambili kaThemba, ubona ukuthi uyamamatheka. Thinta lapho kuthi “Yebo” ukuze uphendule!
Great!\n\n If you are not sure if Temba: Kuhle kakhulu! Uma ungenaso isiqiniselo sokuthi uThemba uyakwazi ukwenza okuthile, ungakhetha okuthi “Angazi”
Some questions have pictures attached.\n:
Eminye yemibuzo inezithombe ezifakwe lapha.

Thinta lapha ukuze ubone isithombe.
Tap close to hide the picture and go bac: Thinta okuthi vala ukuze ufihle isithombe bese ubuyela emuva ekulandeleleni inqubekela phambili yengane.
You can always leave the progress tracke: Ungakwazi ukushiya ithuluzi lokulandelela inqubekela phambili bese ubuyela emuva ukuzoqedela. Zonke izimpendulo zakho zizogcinwa. Thinta lapha.
When you have answered all the questions: Uma usuphendule yonke imibuzo, ungenza umbiko womnakekeli noma ungaphinde ubuke izimpendulo zakho futhi.
You can see all of your completed report: Uyakwazi ukubona yonke imibiko yakho ephothuliwe emuva ekhasini eliyinhloko lemibiko.
Great job, you're ready to start!: Kuhle kakhulu! Manje umsebenzi usukhethiwe. Uma usufuna ukufunda kabanzi ngomsebenzi, ungathinta lesi sithonjana
